citations.narrative:
There were no records of acquisition for the 4 Fallow Deer fawns that were born at the facility in the Spring 2024, and the
4 Fallow Deer fawns were not included on the record of animals on hand.
Per this Section, exhibitors shall make and maintain complete records regarding the details of the acquisition of animals in
their possession in order to account for the sources of the animals. The records shall include any offspring born of any
animal while in his or her possession or under his or her control. The Licensee needs to prepare records of acquisition for
the 4 fawns and add the number of fawns to the record of animals on hand, and the Licensee also needs to ensure that
animal records are kept current for all future animal acquisitions. Correct by 6/17/24.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There were no records of acquisition for the 4 Fallow Deer fawns that were born at the facility in the Spring 2024, and the 
4 Fallow Deer fawns were not included on the record of animals on hand. 
 
Per this Section, exhibitors shall make and maintain complete records regarding the details of the acquisition of animals in 
their possession in order to account for the sources of the animals. The records shall include any offspring born of any 
animal while in his or her possession or under his or her control. The Licensee needs to prepare records of acquisition for 
the 4 fawns and add the number of fawns to the record of animals on hand, and the Licensee also needs to ensure that 
animal records are kept current for all future animal acquisitions. Correct by 6/17/24. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.  
 
*END OF REPORT*
